level.text: CFSA shall maintain the confidentiality of information and records concerning an application for or receipt of a subsidy. Information or records may only be released as permitted by applicable provisions of District or federal law.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 53 DCR 5837 (July 21, 2006); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 55 DCR 12482 (December 12, 2008).
